content: this easy crochet scarf pattern for kids is gender-neutral and super cozy it works up quickly using a large hook and super bulky weight yarn great for last-minute gift-giving this pattern includes the instructions to make a child-sized crochet scarf and the matching adult-sized scarf so you can make matching scarves for the whole family includes a step-by-step video tutorial for the child s size > > printable ad-free pdf versions of the > pattern are available in my ravelry > shop or here https //tidd ly/3weppx2 in my etsy shop which > includes the adult sized scarf > instructions not included in the free > version > **skill level ** beginner **langauge ** english **terminology ** u s terminology **finished sizes ** child size approx 6 wide x 55 long adult size approx 8 wide x 60 long o measurements do not include fringe **follow me on social media to see behind-the-scenes of new upcoming designs and giveaways ** **instagram ** www instagram com/theloopylamb **facebook ** www facebook com/theloopylamb **pinterest ** www pinterest com/theloopylamb **youtube ** check out my youtube channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucd4hdqudbfqqbbgm-bo7myg **blog ** www theloopylamb com **disclaimer ** feel free to sell the item created by this pattern but please provide pattern credit back to me when posting online and please provide a link to my blog http //www theloopylamb com http //www theloopylamb com please do not resell distribute duplicate or share this pattern in any printed or digital form or claim this pattern as your own original design please do not use my photos when selling your finished items please note that due to the nature of digital downloads i do not offer refunds on the purchase of digital downloads if you have any questions at all about the pattern please feel free to send me a message through ravelry or via email ashley@theloopylamb com
